name: .LZC File Extension
summary: Learn about .LZC files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: LZC files are not meant to be manually opened. Instead, they are referenced by the Need for Speed game to load gameplay content.
However, there are several modding tools available to modify LZC files for users looking to alter the game content. One of these tools is SpeedReflect Binary.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
